amendment.description: Amendment applies the same timelines that the RAPID Act establishes for new projects to projects that are currently under review.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 113-374 to provide for projects that are under environmental review at the time of enactment to be completed within the deadlines that the underlying bill outlines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
